To get the frequencies:

```table()```

Relative frequencies

```table() / length()```

Cumulative Relative Frequencies

1. Get the intervals

```hist(x, breaks = , plot = FALSE)```

2. Get the cumulative frequencies

```cumsum()```

3. Cumulative relative frequeicies

```cumsum() / length()```
